â€œI found the high to be a quick onset decently long lasting high, lasting about a hour and a half to two hours on a small bowl.

The cerebral effects took hold first, making everything seem interesting and brighter because I was happier. I was also feeling stress free and chilled out mentally.

The next effect was focus. I was able to focus on one thing really well. Beware of multitasking while under the effects of th...â€

â€œI picked up Sour Alien today at Sacred Seed in Denver. It's a really pretty strain to look at dense buds with purple throughout. Light flowery smell with almost no smell from the Sour Diesel genetics. The taste was actually quite refreshing (Smoked from Bong). The high is very much consistent with hybrids. It starts with a quick shot to euphoria then tapers down your spine and slowly spreads throughout your extremiti...â€

â€œBeam me up! This is the same Sour D favorite with a Smooooth body high. Happy, uplifting, focused, mind-opening head high but not too much. The Alien relaxes the body and mind which allows for great, anxiety-free flow whether you're on the go or if you want to read/meditate without falling asleep. No issues with dry mouth or munchies. Great for stress relief.â€

â€œExcellent slight indica middle of the road hybrid that kicks like a damn mule due to sour d. genetics. Really good strain for a really good high, but if your looking for a knock your lights out high, I personally would look for a stronger indica but it serves the purpose I got the sour alien for.â€

â€œThis bud is really good when you are seeking sleep, or a lazy feeling.
It is currently helping with my sickness and asthma right now, my sinus is cleared and coughs from asthma are not occurring .â€

â€œIntense head high. Not the greatest if you are around people. Paranoia becomes a problem. But the creativity is incredible if you are by yourself or with a significant other in the woods somewhere.â€
â€œtaste good, perfect for anytime I personally like it right in the morning  when you wake upâ€

â€œWith its mixed reviews on taste and smell (earthy pinesol fuel), Sour Alien OG is a patient favorite who suffer from chronic pain, headaches, stress, and anxiety. Patients say Sour Alien OG makes you feel very uplifted and focused. This flower is available at Philadelphia despensaries.â€

â€œDude, this shit's the bomb... Flavor:  Amazing, lasts throughout the whole bowl down to the ass rip.  You can taste the sour and the diesel the whole time.  Definitely recommend.  Ours was at 33.6%, the highest potency we have smoked, the last being 32%...Dude, just smoke it..
Upon second smoke sesh, strong licorice flavor emerged.  More dominant than anything else. Pleasantly surprised that this flavor emerged.  I w...â€
â€œI can smoke this and it doesn't make me sleepy, so I can go out and have a good time. I tend to enjoy sour strains and this is no different.â€

â€œSour Alien OG tastes amazing to start with! It starts with a great euforic feeling through my body. All feelings of depression or anxiety are gone. Great cerebral high, that makes your head feel heavy. Feeling relaxed, but still upbeat and awake! 5 out of 5â€
â€œlove this strain makes me feel like a alien spaced out high lmlâ€
â€œMade me very body relaxed.â€
â€œGreat strain. The sour catches you a little in the back of the throat but not in a bad way. Nice smooth, happy highâ€

â€œThis is for sure one of the best strains Iâ€™ve ever smoked. I LOVE Sour Alien. Amazing flavor, nice aroma, and the focus it gives me - WOW! I highly recommend!â€

â€œI just picked up 1g never tried before and I am liking it a lot. I feel happy and pain free! I vaped in my pax3 and the taste was sweet and harsh at the same time. Coughed on exhale but not bad. It's been about 15 mins and I can't wait for the pizza to arrive and watch a funny movie. Feeling great, relaxed and not couch locked. Liking this very much think I will grab more of this strain.â€

â€œBH0 (shatter): A daytime favorite for those days that demand work and focus but require the alleviation of depression and lack of motivation symptoms. Although this is a Indica dominate strain it has a energetic nature that is undeniable and would make end of the day stress relief not as complete. The smooth, full vapor was filled with citrus notes and a delicious tip of the tongue aftertaste. A definite must have fo...â€

â€œVery pleasant head high. Kinda gives a dizzy rush feeling, has the capacity to leave you bed bound for a bit. Fun stuff though.â€

â€œNice and Quiet ... very comfortable you don't get locked nor do you get that inane chattiness... Not a before dinner smoke.. gravy boat and mash become a nice palette. Focus is great maybe too much hard to redirect thought process' ( If I really had them at the time )  If I was 13 again this would have been great to lay back stare at the oak leaves waving in the air above me as we discussed Thomas Covenant or Lord of...â€
â€œSuper lazy mode, lol.â€
â€œgood taste, not too strong, but great for headachesâ€

â€œwell I am smoking this now. it is very very pleasant. I have ordered white widow and worry it won't be the nighttime weed for me. I use this mostly for my medical condition and anxiety.  really feels amazing through the body.â€
â€œDefining,y a good one, helps with nausea for sure.â€

â€œReally unique high for me. I had been smoking indicas for a while so when i first tried the sour alien it was a really nice hybrid change up. You could really feel the body high. I was able to get a lot done, but also have the more pleasant effects of a heady indica. No real couch lock. Took away stress a feel good giggly high. very talkative. A good social high. Recommend to take with or at a party with friends. I'm...â€
â€œExcellent relaxation and make you smile bud. High valley healing in Moffat, co has the BEST SA I've seen by far. extremely potent.â€

â€œShe's heavy. Creativity and sativa like effects quickly trickle away into a couch lock and spacey brains. Good for insomnia and pain, but I would only smoke at night. Might buy again if I see an exceptional bud but I prefer other indicas.â€
â€œvery smooth makes a really good jointâ€
â€œSmoked in a Honeycomb Clear concentrate pen. Starts off with a taste of lemon and finishes with a piney, earthy taste that is pure sativaâ€

â€œVery intense and immediate head and body high. Would not be good if you get paranoid easy. It's a a night time smoke for sure. I personally won't be picking more of this up anytime soon, I'm more of an uplifting and energetic high kind of person. Flavor 9.5/10 High 9/10 Smell  8.5/10â€
â€œGave it a 5. A solid escaping feel. Felt a little tingly while watching TV. Will definitely use this after a long day of work to just unwind for a bit and go to bed. Didn't feel hungry at all.â€
â€œCalmly Baked. Starts off light with the ability to fully converse and feel uplifted. The calm baked feeling is a bit delayed and when it settles in you'll feel like you're floating in space.â€
â€œA steady and neat high; leaves you tingly in some body parts but really allows your mind to relax. Pleasant strain.â€

â€œLoved it. A truly happy high. We toked at night before playing some games, and were energetic enough to have fun, stay slightly focused, and have a great time â€” without feeling too tired. 

Euphoric and lots-o-laughs.â€
â€œI got an uncured strain I'm not sure of what makes that different. Researching now but so far a calm, happy feeling, it's late so I'm hoping for sleepy effects.â€

â€œThis is an awesome strain. One of the best cerebral highs I've had in a while. All of my pain went away in no time. It's a fun one to enjoy with friends. Music seemed so much better. Alien had a few purple leaves too. I definitely plan on getting it again.â€
â€œdefinitely one to try out. tastes great.  had a great price.  no complaints.  happy high for sure :) ğŸ’™â€

â€œI just smoked a little nug and instantly I can't stop smilie I am blasted with happy ness but in a good way I can just taste the citrusy earthy sour flavores that blend together and stick in your mouth so far amazing and beautiful smoke again for sure my homies.â€
â€œWhen I first smelt it I knew I was going to be very happy about it. I lit the bowl and instantly began to smile. I did start to trip a little bit but ain't nothing wrong with that.â€

â€œSour Alien from Terrapin is a good early evening choice. Relaxing, but won't put you down for the count. My gram was one large, dark bud; very pretty, very frosty. A fruity taste with a diesel finish brings on a relaxed and calming buzz. Pairs well with Forged in Fire.â€

â€œWeapon of choice: PAX 2

Smooth and uplifting high. Ideal Hybrid for indica-leaners or those stressing out. Stimulated good conversations without any couch lock feel. No harsh come downs either.

Give it a try!â€
â€œgood body high but caused a major panic attackâ€

â€œinteresting look to it, was immediately curious. enjoyed the smell & taste. made me incredibly indifferent to all situations around me but was happy all around. went snowboarding directly after smoking Sour Alien and had more fun than usual.â€

â€œIt's a nice strain for getting deep into interesting science videos and stuff. However moreso than any other strain, this seems to have a harsh comedown and hangover complete with headaches and restless limbs. Maybe I'm just sensitive to that sort of thing (although other strains do not do the same), so if you're not, you'll enjoy it. But for me, it's just not good enough to warrant the after effects.â€

â€œSo-so. Get's me a bit high but nothing really special about this stuff to me. Strange because I like Sour D and Alien Kush. At least no anxiety. This has on occasion relieved my head ache. Though another time it gave me a head ache. It definitely has some effect on the way one's head feels. Unfortunately, it doesn't act consistently in a positive way, to want make me use it for headaches.â€
â€œlemony citrus, 80% THC in current live resin pull and snap form,positive vibes,relaxing head and body highâ€
